name: They Desire Fire
description:
They Desire Fire - A quick paced puzzle game that places you in a maze of traps and monsters looking for you. Hide in the shadows and set yourself up nicely to get to the end!

This is IndieScape Games' entry to the Brackey's Game Jam and currently in a very rough draft. We have had so much fun making it that after the competition we are going to continue working on this with new art, a rework of all of the levels (11 in this first build), and a small story line!
